title: (x) Marcel Belanger - Freestyle Script {Nick C}
content:
A friend of mine has asked me to identify this script. He tells me its name is "Freehand." Anyone know it?

I suspect it's a clone of something familiar.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018064917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoBelangerGradient.jpg)
author: John Nolan

comments.content: Not FreeHAND, but [FreeSTYLE](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018064917/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/freestyle-script/), an old Letraset face...
Duh! Of course! Thanks for that.
